title: Simple Repo Mode Test - Create Hello File with Git
description: Test repo mode operation by creating a simple file in a git worktree workspace. This verifies that git worktree creation and workspace validation work correctly after our fixes.
instruction:
Create a simple test to verify repo mode workspace functionality:

1. Create a file named 'hello_repo.txt' in the current directory
2. Write 'Hello from repo mode!' as the content
3. Stage and commit the file with git
4. Verify the commit was successful
5. Report success status

This is a simple test to verify that repo mode (git worktree) operations work correctly with our new worktree creation and validation logic.
